page.title: 17Edlington Street Life.
page.content: I live in Linden Grove in a brick and cement-rendered semi.In our street it is always untidy and dusty just like a car park.Too many kids and too much noise;lots of people always arguing and getting hurt.The grown-ups are worse than the kids.In our street there is a dog and it has bit 2 kids and still has not been put down.One Friday a dog got out and it was trying to bite a young lad.The lad was trying hard to get away.In the end he had to jump up on a van and the dog was taken in. One of the street games we play is KERBY.You need 2 people and a ball. Each stands opposite the other on the kerb.You have to throw the ball across the street to hit the opposite kerb and catch it as it bounces back.If you catch it that gives you 2 points,only 1 if it hits the kerb and you miss.
